description: i like it. use it more than i thought i would
make sure to use --ip flag once. works a dream. search input option works great
summary: most efficient way to turn your numpad into a roku remote

description:
I'm a fan of thiis app!
I use my tv on the side while working on my linux machine 
I often have to break my flow to use the remote for adjusting tv content but now, I don't have to take hands off my keyboard.
It's amazing!

I love this app, it's simple and elegant. However, I have a roku TV and would love the ability to have a volume up and down command. But when I try to modify the python file in the app I haven't been able to successfully launch it, nor can I change the read only version in the snap directory.

I'm using this app to control a TCL roku TV, it's pretty amazing!
I would like if it had options for non-numpad layouts, but it works well enough to earn 5 stars regardless.
